thread.title: British Airways launch 'Kids Fly Free' from Newcastle to London Heathrow
thread.title_full: British Airways launch 'Kids Fly Free' from Newcastle to London Heathrow | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: British Airways launch 'Kids Fly Free' from Newcastle to London Heathrow
text:
Free kids flights with an adult ticket from Newcastle to Heathrow Credit: PA British Airways has started a ‘Kids Fly Free’ scheme from Newcastle Airport to London Heathrow.
The initiative will run until 1 November 2015 - and to qualify an adult must buy an adult flight ticket.
It applies to children aged 11 and under.
Andrew Crawley, British Airways’ chief commercial officer, said: "We know it can be a struggle to keep the kids entertained over the summer holidays and long car journeys can be difficult. So what quicker, easier or cheaper way to see a bit more of the UK, than to jump on a British Airways flight where the kids travel for free?"
Last updated Wed 5 Aug 2015 Travel Newcastle airport London Heathrow Airport
